summary: Fitted steel helmets mainly for human characters
descriptionHtml:
These are refitted helm meshes to fix the floating issue and bighead effect on your characters. I play a nord and it\'s been bugging me so much I never used the helmets.

Meshes currently changed (v03):

glass
hide
imperial
steel (fixed some issues for better compatibility)


TO INSTALL - drop the meshes folder in your Skyrim data folder
TO UNINSTALL - remove helm files from the armor folder


Warning! - these clip with some of the non-human races, such as orcs and wood elves, causing their ears to poke through the sides. (Although they work great with altmer and almost great with dark elf)


Feel free to use these, just mention me somewhere.
author: lycante
